name: TX_NDC_INFORMATION
description: This table contains Medical National Drug Code (NDC) information. Since one transaction may be associated with multiple NDC codes, each row in this table represents one NDC code and is identified by the transaction ID and line number. The data for this table is extracted using a KB_SQL query.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique accounts receivable transaction record ID.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line number to identify each row ofï¿½Medical National Drug Code (NDC) data associated with an individual transaction.

columns.name: NDC_CODES_ID
columns.description: The ID of the Medical National Drug Code (NDC) associated with a transaction.

columns.name: NDC_CODES_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NDC_CODES_ADMIN_AMT
columns.description: The NDC amount associated with this charge.

columns.name: NDC_CODES_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The Medical National Drug Code (NDC) unit associated with the charge.
